ygData.subject: Re: I'm Baaaaaaaack
ygData.msgSnippet: ... wrote: EQ-Toolbox is now carrying the LDoN maps.  They are very helpful, as are the rest of zones.  But EQAtlas is still the best resource for what is in
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Melanie Johnson <melanie_6602@y...>
wrote:
EQ-Toolbox is now carrying the LDoN maps. They are very helpful, as
are the rest of zones. But EQAtlas is still the best resource for
what is in the zone, and where. He doesn't update it anymore but he
does take submissions.

I've tried the hunt the area idea and get nothing on my maps. Even
though I've spent days in a zone, and in my younger days weeks!

Tuldayen

> --- "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@m...> wrote:
> > Not sure yet. I'm still re-familiarizing myself with
> > all the commands again!
> > LOL So far it seems ok. I've had to redo a few of my
> > keys but other than
> > that everything else is cool, I do like the map
> > feature though! That is
> > really going to be helpful, though do I have all the
> > maps or do I need to
> > explore an area to gain them?
> >
> > Steve
> >
>
> I haven't checked it in a while, but eqtoolbox.com use
> to have maps to most, if not all, the zones out there
> for download. Might want to check it out. ;)
>
